title: Purple Eyes - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Josei   Mystery   Romance   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead
author: Prisca Primasari
description:
Because sometimes being unable to feel anything is better than to bear the unbearable pain.

Ivarr Amundsen lost his ability to feel. The person he loved die in a cruel manner, and then he chose to not feel anything again just like a living statue.

 But when Ivar met Solveig, slowly but surely he became able to feel his emotion again. Solveig, the strange girl who came into his life. Solveig, a strange and mysterious girl.

Located in Trondheim, Norway, this story will take you to the gloomy and snowy period but love will always be there even in the darkest moment.>
